bulletpoints.bulletpoint: Architected and shipped a DJ Deck feature, balancing accessibility with depth for hobbyist DJs, increasing user engagement and satisfaction.
Founded and led Wave's Resident DJ Program, elevating user-generated content and boosting community engagement during downtime between major events.
Designed and implemented WaveMaker venue tool, empowering users to create custom virtual venues, enhancing platform customization.
Collaborated with headline artists (John Legend, Imogen Heap) to bring unique VR concert experiences to Wave, strengthening brand prestige and reach.
Directed social media presence during transition, driving brand trust and engagement through a structured posting schedule and user interaction.
Developed social safety features for Wave VR, setting new standards for user safety, leading to improved community feedback and retention.
Spearheaded Wave’s pivot from VR to 2D video, maintaining high levels of user engagement during a strategic platform shift.
Built backend and frontend Unity features, supporting Wave’s VR and 2D video experiences with high-performance C# codebase integration.
Led exploratory project to port VR content to Roblox, enabling Wave to expand into new markets and user demographics.
Optimized Wave’s user interface for improved accessibility, increasing app adoption and user satisfaction.
Managed Wave's social channels, growing brand visibility through interactive campaigns, memes, and professional user engagement.
Pioneered the Resident DJ Program, enabling both community and professional DJs to perform, significantly increasing user-generated content.
Advocated for critical user-requested features, resulting in prioritized development that boosted user satisfaction and platform loyalty.
Enhanced DJ deck with features like beat matching and EQ, delivering a robust tool that attracted serious and casual DJs alike.
Implemented Wave’s immersive concert experiences on Meta Rift, ensuring high-quality and stable performance in a VR environment.
Conducted in-depth research on VR social safety standards, integrating best practices and elevating user trust in Wave’s platform.
Innovated with creative teams to build WaveMaker, allowing users to design personalized environments and deepening engagement.
Analyzed community feedback across social platforms, leading to optimized features that met evolving user expectations.
Successfully advocated for and executed social safety updates, contributing to Wave’s industry-leading VR safety standards.
Designed accessible yet sophisticated DJ tools, balancing UX needs with technical depth, satisfying diverse DJ user profiles.
Created memes and interactive posts as interim social media manager, enhancing Wave’s social media engagement and community trust.
Built flexible backend support for custom Wave experiences, enabling rapid deployment of new features for high-profile events.
Launched a user-centered Resident DJ Program, boosting daily activity and long-term engagement within the community.
Drove a successful social media Q&A, addressing user concerns and deepening community connection with Wave’s brand.
Played a key role in pivoting Wave from VR to 2D, strategizing ways to keep content engaging across both mediums.
Co-led strategic conversations with CCO on advanced UI/UX for DJ features, enhancing functionality and intuitiveness.
Researched and integrated advanced social safety tools, protecting user privacy and comfort in shared virtual spaces.
Identified critical user needs through community data analysis, advocating for impactful feature prioritization.
Leveraged Unity and C# for complex feature development, maintaining efficient, maintainable codebases for Wave’s growing platform.
Enhanced brand engagement by managing content schedules, responding to feedback, and maintaining consistent social presence.
